description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 3D battleships game for up to 4 local players. Each player is equipped with two types of rockets and with the defence radar. Player's goal is to find and sink all enemy ships. Game is played in dynamic ocean where any explosion causes a big wave.
